TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationSection Inherits ConfigurationElement

span.span: Represents a section within a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您使用類別來實作自訂的區段類型。You use the class to implement a custom section type. 擴充類別，以提供自訂的處理和以程式設計方式存取自訂組態區段。Extend the class to provide custom handling and programmatic access to custom configuration sections. 如需有關如何使用自訂組態區段，請參閱[How to： 建立自訂組態區段使用 ConfigurationSection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234)。For information about how use custom configuration sections, see [How to: Create Custom Configuration Sections Using ConfigurationSection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/febaca98-c727-4017-95ed-82e2fb6cf234). 區段中的項目以註冊其處理型別`configSections`項目。A section registers its handling type with an entry in the `configSections` element. 如需範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節所示的組態檔摘錄。For an example, see the configuration file excerpt shown in the Example section. > [!NOTE] > 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，組態區段處理常式所使用的組態設定進行變更以程式設計的方式。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, configuration section handlers were used to make changes to configuration settings programmatically. 現在，所有預設設定區段都都由擴充的類別類別。Now, all the default configuration sections are represented by classes that extend the class. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計的方式實作自訂區段。The following example shows how to implement a custom section programmatically. 如需示範如何實作及使用自訂的區段，使用屬性化的模型實作的完整範例，請參閱。For a complete example that shows how to implement and use a custom section implemented using the attributed model, see . [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/CS/CustomConfigurationSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/VB/CustomConfigurationSection.vb#1)] 下列範例是組態檔的摘錄，套用至前一個範例。The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file as it applies to the previous example. ```xml
```

block.para:
您可以使用程式設計或宣告式 （使用屬性） 的程式撰寫模型來建立自訂組態區段：You can use a programmatic or a declarative (attributed) coding model to create custom configuration sections:
- 程式設計模型。Programmatic model. 此模型，針對每個區段屬性您必須建立屬性以取得或設定其值將它加入至基礎的內部屬性包基底類別。This model requires that for each section attribute you create a property to get or set its value and add it to the internal property bag of the underlying base class.
- 宣告式模型。Declarative model. 這個簡單的模型，也稱為屬性化的模型，可讓您使用的屬性，而將其屬性定義區段屬性。This simpler model, also called the attributed model, allows you to define a section attribute by using a property and decorating it with attributes. 這些屬性會指示 ASP.NET 組態系統有關的屬性類型和其預設值。These attributes instruct the ASP.NET configuration system about the property types and their default values. 這項資訊，透過反映，取得與 ASP.NET 組態系統會建立區段屬性物件，並執行必要的初始化。With this information, obtained through reflection, the ASP.NET configuration system creates the section property objects and performs the required initialization.
類別允許以程式設計方式存取編輯組態檔。The class allows programmatic access for editing configuration files. 您可以存取這些檔案進行讀取或寫入，如下所示：You can access these files for reading or writing as follows:
- 讀取。Reading. 您使用或讀取組態資訊。You use or to read configuration information. 請注意使用者讀取或處理序必須具有下列權限：Note that the user or process that reads must have the following permissions:
- 讀取組態檔，在目前的組態階層層級上的權限。Read permission on the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 讀取權限的所有父組態檔。Read permissions on all the parent configuration files.
如果您的應用程式需要唯讀存取它自己的設定，則建議您使用多載的方法，在 Web 應用程式，或方法在用戶端應用程式的情況下。If your application needs read-only access to its own configuration, it is recommended you use the overloaded methods in the case of Web applications, or the method in the case of client applications.
這些方法會提供存取目前的應用程式的快取的設定值，其具有較佳的效能比類別。These methods provide access to the cached configuration values for the current application, which has better performance than the class.
如果您使用靜態採用方法參數，參數必須參考應用程式在其中執行程式碼; 否則會忽略此參數與目前正在執行的組態資訊會傳回應用程式。If you use a static method that takes a parameter, the parameter must refer to the application in which the code is running; otherwise, the parameter is ignored and configuration information for the currently-running application is returned.
- 撰寫。Writing. 您可以使用其中一種寫入組態資訊的方法。You use one of the methods to write configuration information. 請注意，寫入的處理序的使用者必須具有下列權限：Note that the user or process that writes must have the following permissions:
- 寫入設定檔案和目錄，在目前的組態階層層級上的權限。Write permission on the configuration file and directory at the current configuration hierarchy level.
- 讀取所有的組態檔的權限。Read permissions on all the configuration files.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用建構函式，您必須先定義自訂區段類型。To use the constructor, you need to define a custom section type first. 如需範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example see the class overview. ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個 建構函式。The following example shows how to use the constructor. 這個範例假設您已建立名為自訂區段類別`CustomSection`。This example assumes that you have created a custom section class named `CustomSection`. 如需這種類別的範例，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of such a class, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/CS/CustomConfigurationSection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/VB/CustomConfigurationSection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void DeserializeSection (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);

Protected Friend Overridable Sub DeserializeSection (reader As XmlReader)
protected public: virtual void DeserializeSection(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader);

param.name: reader
param.span: 從組態檔讀取的 物件。

span.span: The object, which reads from the configuration file.
Reads XML from the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 還原序列化指從組態檔、 其轉換成即時資料，以及其儲存在物件中的讀取 XML 資料。Deserialization refers to the reading of XML data from a configuration file, its transformation into real-time data, and its storage in an object.

exception.span: 在組態檔中找不到項目。

span.span: found no elements in the configuration file.

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetRuntimeObject() cil managed

protected public: virtual System::Object ^ GetRuntimeObject();

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回自訂物件。

span.span: Returns a custom object when overridden in a derived class.
The object representing the section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當方法在執行階段呼叫，組態系統會先建立適當的執行個體類別，並再傳回的物件，它會從取得方法。When the method is called at run time, the configuration system first creates an appropriate instance of the class, and then returns the object it obtains from the method. 根據預設，只會傳回物件，代表的呼叫。By default, simply returns the object that represents the from which it is called. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/CS/CustomConfigurationSection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection/VB/CustomConfigurationSection.vb#4)]

para.span: 您可以覆寫方法，以在執行階段傳回的自訂型別。

span.span: You can override the method to return a custom type at run time.

para.span: 例如，若要限制可修改執行階段中的設定類別，您可以覆寫，如果有的話，會強制執行的限制的設定，您可以修改的自訂型別傳回。

span.span: For example, to restrict runtime modification of the settings in the class, you can override and return a custom type that enforces restrictions on which settings can be modified, if any.

para.span: 如果執行階段物件僅供內部，傳回的物件不能外定義它的組件。

span.span: If the runtime object is internal only, the returned object cannot be used outside the assembly that defines it.

para.span: 其中一種方式來建立衍生自物件和只能存取您在執行的組件中的程式碼時建立的內部執行階段物件的方法會傳回您實作。

span.span: One way to create an object that derives from and can only be accessed by code in your assembly at run time is to create an internal runtime object that has a method that returns your implementation.

span.span: An XML string containing an unmerged view of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化是指包含物件，以 XML 格式和其存放裝置的組態檔中的即時資料的轉換。Serialization refers to the transformation of real-time data, contained in an object, to XML format and its storage to a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool ShouldSerializeElementInTargetVersion (System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement element, string elementName, System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName targetFramework);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldSerializeElementInTargetVersion(class System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement element, string elementName, class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName targetFramework) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function ShouldSerializeElementInTargetVersion (element As ConfigurationElement, elementName As String, targetFramework As FrameworkName) As Boolean

protected public: virtual bool ShouldSerializeElementInTargetVersion(System::Configuration::ConfigurationElement ^ element, System::String ^ elementName, System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ targetFramework);

param.name: element
param.span: 可供序列化的候選 物件。

span.span: The object that is a candidate for serialization.

param.name: elementName
param.span: 顯示在 XML 中的 物件名稱。

span.span: The name of the object as it occurs in XML.
The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

summary.span: 表示指定的項目是否應該在組態物件階層架構針對指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 目標版本序列化時予以序列化。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified element should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

returns.span: 如果應該序列化 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的每個組態區段[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但只有指定的項目是指定之版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the specified element is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 如果您實作的組態區段，而且您不覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段中所包含的所有組態項目會都序列化所有 framework 版本。If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default all configuration elements that are contained in the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool ShouldSerializePropertyInTargetVersion (System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty property, string propertyName, System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName targetFramework, System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement parentConfigurationElement);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ShouldSerializePropertyInTargetVersion(class System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty property, string propertyName, class System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName targetFramework, class System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement parentConfigurationElement) cil managed

Protected Friend Overridable Function ShouldSerializePropertyInTargetVersion (property As ConfigurationProperty, propertyName As String, targetFramework As FrameworkName, parentConfigurationElement As ConfigurationElement) As Boolean

protected public: virtual bool ShouldSerializePropertyInTargetVersion(System::Configuration::ConfigurationProperty ^ property, System::String ^ propertyName, System::Runtime::Versioning::FrameworkName ^ targetFramework, System::Configuration::ConfigurationElement ^ parentConfigurationElement);

param.name: property
param.span: 可供序列化的候選 物件。

span.span: The object that is a candidate for serialization.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 顯示在 XML 中的 物件名稱。

span.span: The name of the object as it occurs in XML.
The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
The parent element of the property.

summary.span: 表示指定的屬性是否應該在組態物件階層架構針對指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 目標版本序列化時予以序列化。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified property should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

returns.span: 如果應該序列化 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的每個組態區段[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但只有在指定的屬性是指定之版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the specified property is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 如果您實作的組態區段，而且您不覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段中所包含的所有組態屬性會都序列化所有 framework 版本。If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default all configuration properties that are contained in the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.

summary.span: 表示目前的 執行個體是否應該在組態物件階層架構針對指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 目標版本序列化時予以序列化。

span.span: Indicates whether the current instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

returns.span: 如果應該序列化目前的區段，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current section should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的每個組態區段[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]和更新版本必須明確覆寫這個方法並傳回`true`，但前提是組態區段會指定版本的有效[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。Each configuration section that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the configuration section is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 針對較舊版本所建立的現有組態區段[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有變更。Existing configuration sections that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基底型別包含這個方法一律會傳回的預設實作`true`。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 如果您實作的組態區段，而且您不覆寫這個方法，預設的組態區段會序列化所有的 framework 版本。If you implement a configuration section and you do not override this method, by default the configuration section will be serialized for all framework versions.
